sanskrit_verse:
पुष्ये तु छन्दसां कुर्याद्बहिरुत्सर्जनं द्विजः ।
माघशुक्लस्य वा प्राप्ते पूर्वाह्णे प्रथमेऽहनि ॥ ४.९६॥
transliteration:
puṣye tu chandasāṁ kuryād bahirutsarjanaṁ dvijaḥ |
māghaśuklasya vā prāpte pūrvāhṇe prathame'hani || 4.96||
sph_interpretive_translation: When the lunar mansion Puṣya prevails, a twice-born shall perform the external abandonment of chanting Vedic meters; or likewise, on the first day of the bright fortnight of Māgha, in the forenoon.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is time-bound and astrologically conditioned
Causation aligns with celestial rhythm and ritual timing
Capacity-based responsibility is calibrated by varna-dharma and temporal purity
Restoration logic operates through precise ritual observance
Consciousness alignment requires synchronization with cosmic order
executable_legal_axioms: IF current nakshatra = Puṣya THEN initiate Vedic meter release protocol FOR dvija class
IF tithi = Māgha Śukla Pratipad AND time = pūrvāhṇa THEN execute bahirutsarjana procedure
IF practitioner = dvija AND ritual condition met THEN authorize external chant abandonment
IF celestial alignment detected THEN trigger dharma compliance audit for twice-born individuals
IF temporal purity window open THEN enable consciousness-congruent liturgical action
supreme_court_application: In matters concerning religious practice and Vedic discipline, the Court shall recognize temporal and astrological thresholds as legitimate grounds for procedural initiation. The precedence of varna-specific duties supersedes general civil timelines when aligned with scriptural injunctions.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes causality through astronomical observation; anupūrvaśaḥ manifests via sequential alignment of mind, body, and mantra. Responsibility arises only upon capacity activation, not intent. No punitive consequence attaches to omission—only completion delay.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate nakshatra-monitoring subsystem for timely ritual alert
Deploy calendar-integrated dharma reminder engine for Māgha Śukla Pratipad
Assign consciousness-state verification before permitting bahirutsarjana execution
Generate completion certificate upon successful Vedic meter release
final_declaration: This law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma stands restored through proper timing and ritual congruence. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
